desc: Shop the Mayko Collection of quality handcrafted leather bags, purses, and accessories made with passion and pride. We have handmade styles, including large totes bags, backpacks, crossbody, hobo, fanny packs, and wallets. We even make Vegan Handbags and purses. Stop by our shop to view our artisan leather bags.

layout.text: "The Handbags Everyone Will Be Talking About."
